support.question: How quickly can I expect a response to my inquiry?
support.answer: Our team typically responds to inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, please call our support line for immediate assistance.

support.question: What are your business hours?
support.answer: We're open Monday to Friday from 9AM to 5PM, and Saturdays from 10AM to 2PM. We're closed on Sundays and public holidays.

support.question: Do you offer 24/7 customer support?
support.answer: While we don't offer 24/7 support, our team monitors critical issues outside business hours. For emergencies, please call our support line.

support.question: Where is your office located?
support.answer: Our headquarters is located at 123 Business Avenue, Suite 200, New York, NY 10001. We also have satellite offices in several other cities.

home.question: What is Durga Foundation's mission?
home.answer: Durga Foundation is dedicated to empowering underprivileged communities through education, healthcare, and sustainable development initiatives.

home.question: How can I donate to Durga Foundation?
home.answer: You can donate through our website's donation portal, bank transfer, or by visiting our office. We accept one-time and recurring donations.

education.question: What educational programs does Durga Foundation offer?
education.answer: We run free schools, after-school tutoring, vocational training, and scholarship programs for deserving students.

education.question: How can I enroll my child in your education programs?
education.answer: Visit our education centers with necessary documents (birth certificate, income proof) for admission assessment.

healthcare.question: What healthcare services do you provide?
healthcare.answer: We operate free clinics, mobile medical units, vaccination drives, and health awareness campaigns.

healthcare.question: Are your medical services completely free?
healthcare.answer: Yes, all our basic healthcare services are free for underprivileged communities.

volunteer.question: How can I volunteer with Durga Foundation?
volunteer.answer: Fill out our volunteer application form on the website or visit our office.

volunteer.question: Do you accept international volunteers?
volunteer.answer: Yes, we welcome international volunteers with proper documentation.

donation.question: How are my donations used?
donation.answer: 80% goes directly to programs, 15% to operational costs, and 5% to fundraising.

donation.question: Is my donation tax-deductible?
donation.answer: Yes, all donations are tax-exempt under Section 80G of the Income Tax Act.
